author: game.changer.wallet
title: Project Catapult: None left behind
description: Most of the epic community efforts done by CAs, VCAs, voters, organizers and proposers on each Fund are used once. Many projects get stalled
solution: Let the community save curated, not-funded projects by catapulting them forward with donations and other mechanisms. Lets improve our dApp
experience: GameChanger Finance delivers great value with its next generation wallet and dapps, teaming up Gimbalabs, Dandelion and Yoroi contributors
